Title: Why Your Routines Shape the Future of Your Leadership with Jocko Willink
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks to Jocko Willink. Jocko is a decorated, retired Navy SEAL officer, bestselling author and co-founder of Echelon Front, where he serves as a leadership instructor, speaker and executive coach. In this episode, we talk about why he posts a picture of his watch every morning, what his routine looks like, and what Jocko considers a worthy excuse for skipping that routine. Later in the episode, George chats with Jen Sievertsen, the chief marketing officer here at Ramsey Solutions. Jen shares her morning routine and what she considers a linchpin for her day.

 

You’ll learn:

  • The real reason Jocko posts pictures of his watch
  • The two keys to achieving success with Jocko
  • If Jocko takes days off
  • Why you can’t afford to skip your morning routine
